chatbot.modules.v1.CoreConfig.jsonschema.description:
CoreConfig defines the core runtime configuration for the chatbot inference server.
 Controls session management, streaming behavior, and flow handling.

enabled.description: Whether the core module is enabled (always true for this module)

chatbot.modules.v1.CoreConfig.jsonschema.title: Core Config

chatbot.modules.v1.FlowSettings.jsonsche.description: FlowSettings controls static flow execution behavior

maxGotoDepth.description:
Maximum depth for chained goto executions (default: 10)
 Prevents infinite loops in node graphs

useFallbackWhenNoMatch.description: Whether to use fallback response when no node matches (default: true)

chatbot.modules.v1.FlowSettings.jsonsche.title: Flow Settings

cleanupIntervalSeconds.description:
Cleanup interval in seconds (default: 300 = 5 minutes)
 Range: 30 seconds to 1 hour

defaultMode.description: Default conversation mode when session starts: 'assistant', 'flow', or 'liveChat'

ttlSeconds.description:
Session time-to-live in seconds (default: 1800 = 30 minutes)
 Range: 60 seconds to 24 hours

chatbot.modules.v1.StreamingSettings.jso.description: StreamingSettings controls text streaming behavior for typing effects

textDelayMs.description:
Delay between text chunks in milliseconds (default: 15)
 Set to 0 for instant streaming without typing effect

typingEffectEnabled.description: Whether typing effect is enabled (default: true)

chatbot.modules.v1.StreamingSettings.jso.title: Streaming Settings
